rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 07, 09, 09-1, 09-4, 41, 42, 50}
Unit was previously coded {AFF4051%, AFF5050%, BFF5050, FIN4050, FIN5050}

description: Topics include history of international banking; international financial system and its major players; regulations and interaction with public policy; world debt; foreign exchange markets; lending and investment criteria; the Australian international banking sector.
